copyPageUrlOnlyUrl.message: copy url of the current page

copyPageUrlAsTxt.message: copy url and title of the current page

copyPageUrlAsMd.message: copy url and title of the current page (format: markdown)

copyPageUrlAsRst.message: copy url and title of the current page (format: reStructuredText)

copyPageUrlAsTextile.message: copy url and title of the current page (format: textile)

copyPageUrlAsAdoc.message: copy url and title of the current page (format: AsciiDoc)

copyTabUrlAsTxt.message: copy url and title of this tab

copyTabUrlAsMd.message: copy url and title of this tab (format: markdown)

copyTabUrlAsRst.message: copy url and title of this tab (format: reStructuredText)

copyTabUrlAsTextile.message: copy url and title of this tab (format: textile)

copyTabUrlAsAdoc.message: copy url and title of this tab (format: AsciiDoc)

copyLinkUrl.message: copy decoded url of the link
